LanguageData.MakeIPTWhiteRiceN300.label: Thoroughly thresh Inaho into White rice x300
LanguageData.MakeIPTWhiteRiceN300.description: Make Inaho into White rice. Through this process, the by-product is crushed and disappears.
LanguageData.MakeIPTBrownRiceN300.label: Thoroughly thresh Inaho into Brown rice x300
LanguageData.MakeIPTBrownRiceN300.description: Make Inaho into Brown rice. Through this process, the by-product is crushed and disappears.
LanguageData.MakeITGlutinousMomiN300.label: Thoroughly thresh Inaho into Glutinous rice x300
LanguageData.MakeITGlutinousMomiN300.description: Make Inaho into Glutinous rice. Through this process, the by-product is crushed and disappears.
LanguageData.MakeIPTWhiteRiceC300.label: Cautiously thresh Inaho into White rice x300
LanguageData.MakeIPTWhiteRiceC300.description: Make Inaho into White rice. The by-product bag is converted into a small amount of chemfuel.
LanguageData.MakeITGlutinousMomiC300.label: Cautiously thresh Inaho into Glutinous rice x300
LanguageData.MakeITGlutinousMomiC300.description: Make Inaho into Glutinous rice. The by-product bag is converted into a small amount of chemfuel.
LanguageData.MakeIPTBrownRiceC300.label: Cautiously thresh Inaho into Brown rice (200)
LanguageData.MakeIPTBrownRiceC300.description: Make Inaho into Brown rice. The by-product bag is converted into a small amount of chemfuel.
